scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:es && pnpm run lint:ts
scripts.test: eslint tests && rimraf coverage && vitest --config vitest.node.config.mts --reporter=junit --outputFile=coverage/junit.node.xml && vitest --config vitest.edge.config.mts --reporter=junit --outputFile=coverage/junit.edge.xml && vitest --config vitest.browser.config.mts --reporter=junit --outputFile=coverage/junit.browser.xml && pnpm report
scripts.report: shx cp ./coverage/node/coverage-final.json ./coverage/coverage-0.json && shx cp ./coverage/edge/coverage-final.json ./coverage/coverage-1.json  && shx cp ./coverage/browser/coverage-final.json ./coverage/coverage-2.json && nyc merge ./coverage ./coverage/coverage.json && nyc report --reporter json-summary --reporter html --reporter text -t ./coverage --report-dir ./coverage/summary && npx @monocloud/auth-test-utils check-coverage
